name: slackLists.download.get
desc: Retrieve List download URL from an export job to download List contents.

list_id.desc: ID of the List to export.

job_id.desc: The ID of the recently started job to export the List.

errors.permission_denied: The bot does not have permission to perform this action.
errors.unknown_method: Feature not enabled for this team.
errors.job_not_found: Could not find an export job matching that ID.
